content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────
No new structures have been successfully placed on the map. The agent made several attempts to supply and craft a Lab for Automation Science Pack research; however, no Lab was placed because of inventory shortages and sub-ingredient deficits. In addition, while the agent referenced existing smelting furnaces during operations, these were not newly created structures. For example:
• An iron smelting furnace at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0) was used to produce additional iron plates.
• A copper smelting furnace at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0) was used to produce copper plates.
Their use is noted only as part of resource processing, but no structure has been added as a result of these steps.

ERROR TIPS
────────────
• API Parameter Misuse (get_entities):
  – Ensure the function is called with the correct parameter signature. In one case a keyword argument 'radius' was used unexpectedly, and later positional arguments were passed to a function that accepts none. Verify the API documentation before use.

• Lab Placement and Inventory Verification:
  – Check that the Lab item is present in inventory before attempting placement. The error “Could not place lab at (0.5, 2.5), No lab in inventory” indicates that a prior inventory verification is necessary.

• Handling Null Returns in Entity Retrieval:
  – When filtering retrieved labs, confirm that the returned value is not None (or default to an empty list) to avoid iteration errors such as “‘NoneType’ object is not iterable.”

• Crafting Resource Dependencies:
  – Before crafting complex items (like a Lab), validate that all required sub-ingredients (e.g. iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, copper-cables) are sufficiently available. Address shortages by ensuring that smelting and crafting processes complete their production of these components.

• Sequential Error Resolution:
  – Resolve each sub-ingredient shortage in the correct order. For example, ensure iron plates and copper plates are produced first, followed by their derivative items, to meet all prerequisites for Lab crafting.
